page.title: 18Fire,Communications,Delivery
page.content: My Dad is a part time fireman at Droxford Station.All the men are part time.There is one water_tender,it is an HCB Angus The Fireman answer all calls to villages near{Droxford.}53 calls this year.One person was naughty and phoned when there wasn't a fire.My Dad is a fireman because someone asked him.They practise every Tuesday. Firetower is 60ft. Our school postman starts his round at 5.45am and finishes at 2pm he rides about 22 miles daily on his bike.He empties 9 boxes,he likes his job,he delivers about 1500 letters a day he carries 2 bags each about 100lb. Unigate deliver milk etc. to doorstep 2 brothers have mobile fresh fish and veg vans.Freezer food delivered monthly.Calor gas delivered.Mobile library.Fewer heavy lorries go through village thanks to M27.
